column7: Not the best meat at M.E.A.T...
column9: The restaurant smells of wonderful cooking aromas. The atmosphere says: "meat"! with hooks hanging from the roof. Staff is welcoming and nice. Given all of this, we had great expectations. We expected lovely meat. We were disappointed. The side dishes were not very exciting either.
Great wine great cuts of meat prepared excellent to you liking and we added the app for three which was a perfect complement to the meal. Their wine list was excellent too

column7: Does what it says on the tin!
column9: Great restaurant and the food is outstanding, the only downside is that the service is slow, so don't visit if you are in a hurry. Highly recommend the Ceviche and the Strip Loin.
Lund is a surprisingly quiet town. But this is a great, friendly spot for dinner. Nice steak, tomato salad and roast garlic to die for!

Had the burger, juicy and very tasty and the fries are really crispy! This is a great place, industrial yet cosy interior and tve staff always make you feel very at home. 
Been several times and will come many more!
